summary: In France during the late 18th Century, a man sets out to avenge the death of his friend at the hands of a master swordsman.
cast: Stewart Granger|Eleanor Parker|Janet Leigh|Mel Ferrer|Henry Wilcoxon|Nina Foch|Richard Anderson|Robert Coote|Lewis Stone|Elisabeth Risdon|Howard Freeman|Curtis Cooksey|John Dehner|John Litel|Jonathan Cott|Dan Foster|Owen McGiveney|Hope Landin|Frank Mitchell|Carol Hughes|Richard Hale|George Baxter|Wilson Benge|David Bond|Chet Brandenburg|Barrie Chase|Stephen Chase|Dick Cherney|Noble 'Kid' Chissell|Pat Conway|Henry Corden|John Crawford|Douglass Dumbrille|John Eldredge|John George|Claude Guy|Teddy Infuhr|Tiny Jones|Aram Katcher|Kay Koury|Bert LeBaron|Mitchell Lewis|Anthony Marsh|Frank Mills|Ottola Nesmith|Dorothy Patrick|'Snub' Pollard|Val Raset|Rex Reason|Mitchell Rhein|Robert Robinson|Barbara Ruick|Cosmo Sardo|John Sheffield|Paul Stathes|William Tannen|Frank Wilcox
title: Scaramouche
